metadata.synopsis: Memnos reacts to the druids turning on the tieflings. If the tieflings prevail, he reacts to this also.

0.speaker: Memnos
0.text: These druids are insane - why are they doing this?!

1.speaker: Memnos
1.text: Leave me be, please. Need to... need to gather my wits.
1.context: NodeContext: Shocked and relieved to have survived the druids' attack

2.speaker: Memnos
2.text: The druids... they're all dead. Up to Kelemvor to judge them now.
2.context: NodeContext: Shocked and relieved to have survived the druids' attack
